questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: To be honnest, I really try to be realistic with my future so I've never imagined my life if I had a million euros so far. But I can try ...
I'd begin by building a huge dressing in my house, to wake up the girl in me who dreams about shoes and prom bal. And I would probably stay for one hour each day in it to chose what to wear.
Secondly, if I had 1 million euros, I would buy a cosy house in Tenerife for exemple. It would allow me to escape from my life whenever I want, for just a few days ...
It can seem selfish because the first things I want to do are for me and not for poor child who are starving ... But I REALLY want a dressing !
